metadata.name: Suspicious Cobalt Strike DNS Beaconing - Sysmon
metadata.comment: Detects a program that invoked suspicious DNS queries known from Cobalt Strike beacons

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (startswith(lower(query.hostname), lower('aaa.stage.')) OR startswith(lower(query.hostname), lower('post.1')) OR contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('.stage.123456.'))))

output.summary: Detects a program that invoked suspicious DNS queries known from Cobalt Strike beacons

metadata.objective: Examine fields: Image, CommandLine False positive: Unknown References: https://www.icebrg.io/blog/footprints-of-fin7-tracking-actor-patterns, https://www.sekoia.io/en/hunting-and-detecting-cobalt-strike/
